short_summary: Repairs of the Cavendish & Brackley Beach Dune Crossings stairs and accessible ramps.
description: The Department requires a Prime General Contractor to repair two dune crossing boardwalks located in the Cavendish and Brackley Beaches area. The contract includes the replacement of wooden structures harmed by winter storms. The contractor should provide a demolition of the old ramp and bridge, installation of new steel structures and ramp systems. The job is a two-stage process and have to be done before March 2024. The tender is in English and the contract is in Francese.
